name: Metal Cube 01
effect: Attach this card to 1 of your {M} Pokémon in play. That Pokémon may use this card’s attack instead of its own. At the end of your turn, discard Metal Cube 01.
author: “Big Mama” Tagawa

attacks.name: Metal Reversal
attacks.effect: Before doing damage, you may choose 1 of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon and switch it with the Defending Pokémon.
